definition[2]: a large boat with a sail, used for pleasure or sport
definition[3]: a boat that uses one or more sails

definition[5]: a small open boat used for pleasure, or for taking people between a ship and the shore

definition[9]: a boat that you use on canals

definition[12]: a long thin boat with a flat bottom that you move by pushing a long pole against the bottom of the river – used for pleasure
definition[13]: a boat that is specially made so that you can live on it
